entry.title: https://github.com/com-lihaoyi/mill
entry.content: Mill is a fast JVM build tool that supports Java, Scala and Kotlin. 2-4x faster than Gradle and 4-10x faster than Maven for common workflows, Mill aims to make your project’s build process performant, maintainable, and flexible
